name: Acorn (BluepandaLuna, SHHH)
description:
Acorn is a game made for the Great Autumn Game Jam:2021.

The game is an Isometric puzzle game.

Credits

Art

BluePandaLuna

Programing 

SHHH  - Twitter and Instagram and Twitter @SamDoSound.

Music

  JDC 

Game Summary

It is the last few days of autumn before winter arrives and a squirrel hasn't yet collected any food. Help them by Solving Puzzles to Collect Acorns. 

Push objects  onto (blue)buttons to open Chests.   

objects like Logs and rocks can be pushed.

Logs can be pushed into Rivers to move across them.

Game Controls   

Pause               :       

  Escape Key.

Movement   :        

 W,A,S,D. You will need to hold W and a particular direction you wish to go.
